title: Fix Gift 2 photos not showing and remove placeholder images

requirements.text: Ensure Gift 2 ("Beautiful You") displays only the user-provided 3 photos (and no placeholder photos) by confirming the Gift 2 gallery is driven by HER_PHOTOS from frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts and that HER_PHOTOS is exactly: ['IMG_0131-1.jpeg','IMG_4617-1.jpeg','IMG_0156-1.jpeg'] in that order.

quotes: Why the photo is not appear in website i want them appear remove the place holder photos and add my 3 photos i given u and i want them to appear in webiste

acceptanceCriteria: Gift 2 renders exactly 3 images (no placeholders) and they correspond to the 3 filenames in HER_PHOTOS, in order.
There are no other placeholder image filename references used for Gift 2 anywhere in the frontend code/config.

requirements.text: Ensure the static image assets IMG_0131-1.jpeg, IMG_4617-1.jpeg, and IMG_0156-1.jpeg are present in frontend/public/assets/generated/ with exact matching filenames/case, and that they are actually served by the deployed site at /assets/generated/<filename> so the images load instead of triggering the SafeGeneratedImage fallback.

quotes: Why the photo is not appear in website i want them appear remove the place holder photos and add my 3 photos i given u and i want them to appear in webiste

acceptanceCriteria: In the deployed app, directly opening each URL returns the image (not 404): /assets/generated/IMG_0131-1.jpeg, /assets/generated/IMG_4617-1.jpeg, /assets/generated/IMG_0156-1.jpeg.
When opening Gift 2 in the app, none of the three images show the "Image not found" fallback state.

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the frontend after verifying the assets and config so the latest static files are included, and validate in the live preview that Gift 2 shows the 3 user photos and no placeholder photos.

quotes: i want them to appear in webiste

acceptanceCriteria: After redeploy, Gift 2 shows the 3 user photos and no placeholder photos.
A quick post-deploy check confirms the three /assets/generated/*.jpeg URLs load successfully in the browser.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Keep the app as a static-asset-based photo gallery (no backend image hosting or external storage).
nonGoals: Do not change Gift 3 (couple photos) or the final celebration photo unless required to fix Gift 2 rendering.
Do not add new features beyond making the provided 3 photos appear correctly.
